info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 26 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Big Sioux River Near Florence affecting Grant County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Big Sioux River near Florence.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, The water reaches the bottom of the bridge 1 mile east and 1 1/2 mile north of the gauge
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:00 PM CDT Thursday was 8.6 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Friday evening at 1115 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
